violations.description: Ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds
violations.help: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 3.19 (foreground color: #8c8c8c, background color: #f9f9f9, font size: 12.0pt (16px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 2.35 (foreground color: #ffffff, background color: #db9d47, font size: 10.5pt (14px), font weight: bold). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

violations.description: Ensure the order of headings is semantically correct
violations.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Heading order invalid

violations.description: Ensure that every form element has a visible label and is not solely labeled using hidden labels, or the title or aria-describedby attributes
violations.help: Form elements should have a visible label

nodes.html: <input class="mhForm__input mhForm__input--email" id="mhdde62hc96hi7bp4wn-contact:email" name="contact:email" type="email" aria-describedby="mhdde62hc96hi7bp4wn-error-contact:email" autocomplete="email">
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix all of the following:
  Only title used to generate label for form element

violations.description: Ensure every form element has a label
